ALL ABOUT BEAUTY 2025

ALL ABOUT CONNECTIONS

Inspiration • Innovation • Interaction

Click to view Event or Workshop Info

Event Details

Dates

April 27th (Show)
April 28th (Workshops, additional cost)

Location

River Cree Resort & Casino
300 East Lapotac Blvd
Enoch, AB

Admission

  • General $199.00
  • VIP $229.00

About The Event

INSPIRATION, INNOVATION, INTERACTION.

We have crafted this event for inspiration, innovation and interaction, allowing you to experience the latest industry trends, find ways to optimize your health and wellness, as well as discover ideas to help improve your bottom line. Add in a few cocktails, time to mingle with friends, old and new, and some serious swag; we hope this day will energize and elevate your business for the year to come!

Tickets

General Admission: $199.00

  • Full day access to the show
  • Networking opportunities
  • Complimentary refreshments
  • Event swag bag

VIP Admission: $229.00

  • All General Admission benefits
  • Priority seating
  • Exclusive VIP lounge access
  • Premium swag bag
  • Complimentary cocktail hour

Hotel Accommodations

Limited time hotel rate available

SINGLE OR DOUBLE $175.00

*Rate Available Until March 20, 2025

BOOK NOW

Workshops

KEVIN.MURPHY - Cut & Color - People Collection

Kevin Murphy Master Brandi Holdaway 10:00AM - 5:00PM 11348 - 142 Street NW, Edmonton, AB $299.00
MANNEQUIN SWAG BAG

In the dynamic world of fashion, the artistry of hair colour & cut seamlessly integrates with cutting-edge AI and technology. As stylists in 2025, we harness innovation to craft bespoke results, techniques, and placements. These creations not only reflect individuality and authenticity but also embrace data-driven insights. With products featuring technical advancements that align with our core values, we shape a future of beauty defined by precision and boundless creativity.

  • Blow Dryer
  • Texture.Comb
  • Tail Comb
  • Sectioning/Butterfly Clips
  • 6 Towels
  • Shears
  • Cutting Comb
  • Denman Brush
  • Color Brushes & Bowls
  • Pre-Cut Foils
  • Color Apron
  • Water Sprayer
  • Drinking Water Bottle

MATRIX - Trends 2025

Johanna Costantini & Martin Menard 10:00AM - 5:00PM 11348 - 142 Street NW, Edmonton, AB $299.00
MANNEQUIN SWAG BAG

Transform your approach to hairdressing with this dynamic full-day class. Start your day mastering trending colour techniques including the coveted "Mocha Mouse" look, with National Colour Artist and Contessa finalist, Johanna Costantini. Then, elevate your cutting skills with renowned global artist and multi-time Contessa winner Martin Menard, learning advanced cutting techniques to elevate your cuts to the next level. This combined experience will empower you to create head-turning looks.

  • Blow Dryer
  • Texture.Comb
  • Tail Comb
  • Sectioning/Butterfly Clips
  • 6 Towels
  • Shears/Texturizing
  • Cutting Comb
  • Denman Brush
  • Color Brushes & Bowls
  • Pre-Cut Foils
  • Color Apron
  • Water Sprayer
  • Drinking Water Bottle

Chic Modern Bridal Class: Elevate Your Styling Skills

Amy Glena 9:00AM - 1:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $199.00
LONG HAIR MANNEQUIN

Step into the future of bridal hairstyling with our Chic Modern Bride Hair Class! Perfect for contemporary hairstylists and beauty aficionados, this workshop will teach you how to craft cutting-edge bridal looks that captivate. Explore trendsetting techniques, utilize modern tools & products, personalize with precision, and gain practical experience under expert guidance.

  • Blow Dryer
  • Flat Iron/Curling Iron
  • Elastic
  • Bobby pins/Hair Pins
  • Tail Comb
  • Sectioning/Butterfly Clips
  • Round Brush
  • Styling Brush

MEGIX 10 - Synergistic Blonding + Toning with Morph

Araz Nelson 9:00AM - 12:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $129.00
BLONDE KIT

Get ready to take your services to a new level of efficiency and artistry! Join Araz in this exclusive look-and-learn class as she showcases an express foiling technique paired with the latest innovations from Megix 10. Using our two new lighteners—Lift9 and LiftC, we'll dive into express foiling techniques, mastering toning with Megix Morph, and using and mastering Lift9 + LiftC.

JOHNNY B. - Practical Magic: Hands-On Clipper Cutting

Gabriel Quiriones 9:00AM - 12:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $229.00
MANNEQUIN JB ESSENTIALS KIT

Master two classic men's short- and medium-length hairstyles at this intense hands-on class where your skills are front and center. Merge theory with practice as our trained educators take you step-by-step through each haircut as well as detail the styling involved on the mannequins provided using our four-step cutting method.

  • Clippers/Trimmer
  • Attachments
  • Shears
  • Towels
  • Blow Dryer
  • Hair Clip

XYON - Hair Loss Causes, Treatments and Myths

Dr. Simon Pimstone 9:00AM - 10:00AM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $29.00
SWAG BAG

More and more clients, both male and female, are reporting more concern over hair loss issues than ever. This informative seminar will help you determine how you can help these clients achieve healthy hair growth. Learn why hair loss occurs, what expectations are realistic with proper home care and lifestyle changes, and, most importantly, what they should not do!

AZ CRAFT LUXURY HAIR - AZ Master the Craft Creative

Jeremy Davies-Barbala 10:30AM - 4:30PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $399.00
MANNEQUIN HEAD SWAG BAG

In this dynamic course, you will explore the essential principles of hair cutting while incorporating creative methods that set your work apart. Jeremy will guide you through live demonstrations and hands-on cutting sessions, providing you with the opportunity to practice and perfect your skills under his expert supervision. Learn live haircut demonstrations, advanced creative techniques, and fundamental cutting with a twist.

  • Shears/Texturizers
  • Razor(optional)
  • Blow Dryer with Diffusers
  • Cutting Comb
  • Sectioning Clips

Emerging Trends in Salon Business: Navigate the Future of Beauty

Amy Glena 2:00PM - 5:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $99.00

Elevate your salon's success with our Emerging Trends in Salon Business class! This comprehensive workshop is designed for salon owners, managers, and beauty professionals keen to stay on top of the latest developments shaping the salon industry. Analyze market trends, explore technological advancements, harness social media, embrace sustainability, and identify growth opportunities.

DANNYCO - Nothing but the Trends

Benson Lam 1:00PM - 4:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $199.00
MANNEQUIN

This class is for artists who are looking to expand their skills to gain knowledge of best practices in altering classic looks with a focus on fashion trends.

  • Clippers/Trimmer
  • Attachments
  • Shears
  • Towels
  • Blow Dryer
  • Hair Clip
  • Cutting Combs
  • Barber Brushes

NEUMA - NeuStyle Blowdry Mastery with Neuma

Maggie Arnold 1:00PM - 5:00PM 300 East Lapotac Blvd, Enoch, AB $199.00
LONG HAIR MANNEQUIN SWAG BAG

Transform your blow-dry skills with NeuStyle Blowdry Mastery, where you'll learn advanced techniques for creating flawless styles using eco-luxury, plant-based products. This hands-on class focuses on mastering round-brush blowouts for smooth volume, along with expert tips for air-drying and diffusing to enhance natural texture. With Neuma's high-performance formulas, you'll achieve beautiful, healthy-looking results that last.

  • Blow Dryer
  • Denman Brush
  • Roll Brushes
  • Brushes
  • Sectioning Clips
  • Combs
  • Towel

<style>

/* Base Styles & Variables */
:root {
  --primary: #000000;
  --primary-light: #333333;
  --secondary: #757575;
  --accent: #d4af37;
  --dark: #121212;
  --light: #fafafa;
  --gray: #f1f1f1;
  --gray-dark: #4a4a4a;
  --shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  --shadow-hover: 0 8px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  --radius: 8px;
  --spacing-xs: 4px;
  --spacing-sm: 8px;
  --spacing-md: 16px;
  --spacing-lg: 24px;
  --spacing-xl: 32px;
  --transition: all 0.3s ease;
  
  /* Dark Mode Colors */
  --bg-dark: #121212;
  --bg-dark-light: #1e1e1e;
  --card-bg: #1e1e1e;
  --text-light: #e0e0e0;
  --text-muted: #aaaaaa;
  --border-dark: #333333;
}

/* Global Styles */
body {
  font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: var(--text-light);
  background-color: var(--bg-dark);
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-top: 0;
  color: var(--light);
}

p {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  color: var(--text-light);
}

ul {
  padding-left: var(--spacing-lg);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  color: var(--text-light);
}

/* Container */
.aab-container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: var(--bg-dark);
}

/* Hero Section - Full Width */
.aab-hero {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.aab-hero-img {
  width: 100%;
  display: block;
}

.aab-hero::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  z-index: 1;
}

.aab-hero-content {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 2;
  text-align: center;
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: var(--spacing-xl) var(--spacing-md);
  width: 90%;
  color: white;
}

.aab-hero-title {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  color: white;
}

.aab-hero-subtitle {
  font-size: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
}

.aab-hero-tagline {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  max-width: 700px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  color: white;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .aab-hero-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .aab-hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .aab-hero-img {
    content: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0442/3516/1766/files/AAC-NOBG-mobile.webp?v=1741211350');
  }
}

/* Event Section */
.aab-event-section {
  padding: var(--spacing-xl) var(--spacing-md);
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  background-color: var(--bg-dark);
}

.aab-section-title {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  color: var(--light);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  text-align: center;
  position: relative;
}

.aab-section-title::after {
  content: '';
  display: block;
  width: 60px;
  height: 3px;
  background: var(--accent);
  margin: var(--spacing-sm) auto 0;
}

/* Tab Instructions */
.aab-tab-instruction {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  color: var(--text-muted);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  font-style: italic;
}

.aab-tab-instruction p {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

.aab-tab-instruction p::before,
.aab-tab-instruction p::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  height: 1px;
  background: var(--accent);
  opacity: 0.5;
  width: 30px;
  top: 50%;
}

.aab-tab-instruction p::before {
  right: calc(100% + var(--spacing-md));
}

.aab-tab-instruction p::after {
  left: calc(100% + var(--spacing-md));
}

/* Tabs */
.aab-tabs {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-md);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.aab-tab {
  background: var(--bg-dark-light);
  border: none;
  padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-lg);
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--text-light);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  transition: var(--transition);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), 0 0 8px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-sm);
  position: relative;
}

.aab-tab::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  pointer-events: none;
}

.aab-tab i {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
}

.aab-tab:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7), 0 0 12px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
  background: var(--primary-light);
}

.aab-tab.active {
  background: var(--primary);
  color: var(--light);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), 0 0 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}

.aab-tab.active::after {
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

.aab-tab-content {
  display: none;
  animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease;
}

.aab-tab-content.active {
  display: block;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

/* Cards & Containers */
.aab-card {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  padding: var(--spacing-lg);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
  transition: var(--transition);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
}

.aab-card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
}

/* Info Grid */
.aab-info-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.aab-info-item {
  display: flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-md);
}

.aab-info-icon {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  flex-shrink: 0;
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: var(--bg-dark-light);
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.aab-info-content h4 {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: var(--light);
}

/* Event Description */
.aab-event-description {
  margin-top: var(--spacing-lg);
  padding-top: var(--spacing-lg);
  border-top: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
}

.aab-event-mission {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, var(--primary-light) 100%);
  color: var(--text-light);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: var(--spacing-lg) 0;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.aab-mission-header {
  padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-md);
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.2;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  color: var(--accent);
}

.aab-mission-body {
  padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-lg);
  font-size: 1.05rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
}

.aab-mission-body p {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  color: var(--text-light);
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .aab-mission-header {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    padding: var(--spacing-md);
  }
  
  .aab-mission-body {
    font-size: 1rem;
    padding: var(--spacing-md);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .aab-mission-header {
    font-size: 1.3rem;
  }
  
  .aab-mission-body {
    font-size: 0.95rem;
  }
}

.aab-quote {
  font-style: italic;
  padding: var(--spacing-md);
  background: var(--bg-dark-light);
  border-left: 4px solid var(--accent);
  margin: var(--spacing-lg) 0;
  border-radius: 0 var(--radius) var(--radius) 0;
  color: var(--text-light);
}

/* Badges */
.aab-badge {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: var(--spacing-xs) var(--spacing-sm);
  border-radius: 4px;
  background: var(--bg-dark-light);
  color: var(--text-light);
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
}

.aab-badge-vip {
  background: var(--accent);
  color: var(--dark);
}

/* Workshop Section */
.aab-workshops {
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
}

/* Workshop Grid */
.aab-workshops-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.aab-workshop-card {
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: var(--transition);
  height: 100%;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
}

.aab-workshop-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
}

.aab-workshop-content {
  padding: var(--spacing-md);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 100%;
}

.aab-workshop-header {
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

.aab-workshop-header h3 {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  color: var(--light);
}

.aab-workshop-meta {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-md);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.aab-meta-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.aab-meta-item i {
  color: var(--accent);
}

.aab-price {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: var(--accent);
}

.aab-workshop-badges {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: var(--spacing-xs);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
}

.aab-workshop-desc {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

/* Purchase Button */
.aab-purchase-button-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: var(--spacing-lg) 0;
  background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var(--primary) 0%, var(--primary-light) 100%);
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.aab-purchase-button {
  background: var(--accent);
  color: var(--dark);
  border: none;
  padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-xl);
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: var(--transition);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-sm);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  max-width: 90%;
  text-align: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.aab-purchase-button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  background: #e5c455;
}

.aab-purchase-button:active {
  transform: translateY(1px);
}

/* Ticket Information */
.aab-ticket-info {
  margin: var(--spacing-lg) 0;
  padding: var(--spacing-md);
  background: var(--bg-dark-light);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
}

.aab-section-subtitle {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  color: var(--light);
  text-align: center;
}

.aab-ticket-types {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
  gap: var(--spacing-lg);
}

.aab-ticket-type {
  padding: var(--spacing-md);
  background: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
}

.aab-ticket-type h4 {
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: var(--light);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-dark);
  padding-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
}

.aab-benefits-list {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  color: var(--text-muted);
}

.aab-benefits-list li {
  padding: var(--spacing-xs) 0;
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 1.5rem;
}

.aab-benefits-list li:before {
  content: "•";
  color: var(--accent);
  font-weight: bold;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .aab-ticket-types {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .aab-ticket-type {
    padding: var(--spacing-sm);
  }
  
  .aab-ticket-type h4 {
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
  
  .aab-benefits-list li {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }
}

/* Responsive Styles */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .aab-hero-title {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
  }
  
  .aab-hero-subtitle {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .aab-tabs {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: var(--spacing-sm);
  }
  
  .aab-tab {
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .aab-info-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .aab-workshops-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .aab-purchase-button {
    font-size: 1rem;
    padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-lg);
    width: 85%;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .aab-hero-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .aab-purchase-button {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-md);
    width: 90%;
  }
}

/* Mobile Full Width Adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .aab-container {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
  }
  
  .aab-event-section {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-sm);
  }
  
  .aab-card {
    border-radius: 0;
    margin-left: -var(--spacing-sm);
    margin-right: -var(--spacing-sm);
    width: calc(100% + var(--spacing-sm) * 2);
    padding: var(--spacing-md);
  }
  
  .aab-workshop-card {
    border-radius: var(--spacing-xs);
  }
  
  .aab-workshops-grid {
    padding: 0;
  }
  
  .aab-hero-content {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
